column4: Hello everyone, can anyone help me with mysqld configuration ?
Can someone help me with mysqld configuration ?
just state the problem and if anyone can answer, they will
been a while since ive worked with web servers, isnt there a apache.conf and you uncomment mysql to load the mysql module?
ok now i remember, i think it was php.conf that had the modules
it's possible but I think mysqld has to run before php can use it...
